Lyric:
[00:07.100]I never came to the beach, or stood by the ocean
[00:13.690]I never sat by the shore, under the sun with my feet in the sand
[00:19.930]But you brought me here and I'm happy that you did
[00:26.560]'Cause now I'm as free as birds catching the wind
[00:34.210]I always thought I would sink, so I never swam
[00:41.000]I never went boatin', don't get how they are floatin'
[00:44.530]And sometimes I get so scared of what I can't understand
[00:50.380]But here I am, next to you
[00:57.220]The sky's more blue in Malibu
[01:04.350]Next to you in Malibu
[01:11.160]Next to you
[01:15.530]We watched the sun go down as we were walking
[01:22.370]I'd spent the rest of my life standing here talking
[01:29.290]You would explain the current, as I try to smile
[01:35.790]Hoping that you'll stay the same, and nothing will change
[01:40.210]And it'll be us, just for a while
[01:45.070]Do we even exist?
[01:48.640]That's when I make the wish, to swim away with the fish
[01:56.370]Is it supposed to be this hot all summer long?
[02:03.440]I never would've believed you if three years ago you told me
[02:08.320]I'd be here writing this song
[02:12.830]But here I am, next to you
[02:19.530]The sky is so blue in Malibu
[02:26.490]Next to you in Malibu
[02:33.300]Next to you
[03:04.380]Next to you
[03:07.770]The sky's so blue in Malibu
[03:14.560]Next to you
[03:18.860]We are just like the waves that flow back and forth
[03:25.880]Sometimes I feel like I'm drowning
[03:27.830]And you're there to save me
[03:29.890]And I wanna thank you with all of my heart
[03:34.700]It's a brand new start
[03:38.480]A dream come true in Malibu
